title: 训练计划 I (训练计划 I)
content: 思路: // @Title: 训练计划 I (训练计划 I) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-20 17:52:00 // @Runtime: 2 ms // @Memory: 49.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int[] exchange(int[] nums) { int left=0; int right=nums.length-1; while(left<right){ while(left<right&&nums[right]%2==0){ right--; } while(left<right&&nums[left]%2==1){ left++; } if(left<right){ int temp=nums[left]; nums[left]=nums[right]; nums[right]=temp; } } return nums; } }
